metadata.title: CVE-2022-26047 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper input validation for some Intel(R) PROSet/Wireless WiFi, IntelvPro(R) CSME WiFi and Killer(TM) WiFi products may allow unauthenticateduser to potentially enable denial of service via local access.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
